plugins\/mobile\/plugin_info\/configurat.Réponse Ask sensible à la case :: Ask answer sensitive to the box:

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/secPage.Il vous faut simplement rentrer votre id: All you have to do is enter your Market ID and password
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/secPage.- Vous entrez l'url de votre Jeedom (int: - You enter the url of your Jeedom (internal or external), as well as the access identifiers to it and you confirm with the LOGIN button
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/secPage.- Vous cliquez sur QR Code : un nouvel é: - You click on QR Code: a new screen appears; you can scan a QRCode from the Mobile plugin of the box you want to add, via the QRCODE tab of the plugin

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Disponibles dans la liste des plugins et: Available in the list of plugins and integrated into the Dashboard of the Mobile App

Are not transmitted to the Mobile App

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Sont transmis à l’App Mobile en se basan: Are transmitted to the Mobile App based on generic types
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Plugins non testés et non transmis: Plugins not tested and not transmitted
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Ne sont pas transmis à l’App Mobile: Are not transmitted to the Mobile App

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fivePag.On recherche l'adresse, on nomme la Zone: We search for the address, name the Zone, and validate
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fivePag.La zone apparaitra en rouge, signifiant: The zone will appear in red, meaning that you are not in the Zone
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fivePag.Si vous vous trouvé dans la zone à sa cr: If you are in the area when it is created, it will turn green after a few seconds
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fivePag.Ajouter une zone ajoutera dans votre équ: Adding a zone will add a binary command to your telephone equipment in the Mobile plugin, which we can use to program actions based on its state

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/qrcodev.AJOUT DE LA BOX SUR VOTRE APPLICATiON MO: ADDING THE BOX TO YOUR MOBILE APP
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/qrcodev.Vous pouvez choisir un utilisateur : un: You can choose a user: a QRCode will be generated. You can then scan the QRCode from the new application, and thus add this box to your application
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/qrcodev.Erreur Pas d\\'adresse interne (voir con: Error No internal address (see configuration of your Jeedom!)
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/qrcodev.Erreur Pas d\\'adresse externe (voir con: Error No external address (see configuration of your Jeedom!)

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Vous pouvez personnaliser le Menu de vot: You can customize the Menu of your WebView via the Mobile plugin or the application
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Une modale s'ouvre et vous propose vos t: A modal opens and offers you your phones already connected
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Cliquer sur Configurer Menu sur le télép: Click on Configure Menu on the chosen phone
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Le nombre d'icônes peut aller de 1 à 4: The number of icons can range from 1 to 4
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.En cochant Menu Default, le menu configu: By checking Menu Default, the menu configured on this phone becomes the default on all your phones
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Via l'application Mobile : si vous avez: Via the Mobile application: if you have configured a default box, then the Custom Menu appears in the application menu
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/sixPage.Même principe que via le plugin Mobile: Same principle as via the Mobile plugin

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/firstPa.Pour connecter votre téléphone : il y a: To connect your phone: there are 2 possible methods

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Ce Plugin est entièrement compatible, il: This plugin is fully compatible, it requires no action on your part
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Ce plugin est compatible, penser à vérif: This plugin is compatible, remember to check the Generic Types on the commands
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/plugin..Le Plugin n\\'est pas compatible, vous p: The Plugin is not compatible, you can activate it if you wish

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/object..Envoyer cette pièce vers l\\'application: Send this part to the application

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fiveMod.On recherche l'adresse, on nomme la Zone: We search for the address, name the Zone, and validate
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fiveMod.La zone apparaitra en rouge, signifiant: The zone will appear in red, meaning that you are not in the Zone
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fiveMod.Si vous vous trouvé dans la zone à sa cr: If you are in the area when it is created, it will turn green after a few seconds
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fiveMod.Ajouter une zone ajoutera dans votre équ: Adding a zone will add a binary command to your telephone equipment in the Mobile plugin, which you can use to program actions based on its state

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.Pour acceder aux fonctionnalités comme l: To access features such as Notifications, Menu Personalization or Geolocation, you must first have selected at least one current box
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.Pour cela, dans l'onglet Boxs, il faut s: To do this, in the Boxes tab, you must select a box and identify yourself
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.Une fois les identifiants entrés, la box: Once the identifiers have been entered, the box moves to the top of the list
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.Si elle répond au ping, elle a un voyant: If it responds to the ping, it has a green light
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.On peut cliquer sur Synchroniser pour me: You can click on Synchronize to update the status of the boxes
plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/modal\/fourPag.Pour acceder a toutes les fonctionnalité: To access all the features, you must click on the configured box; this will allow the application to retrieve its information, and therefore authorize the menu displays

plugins\/mobile\/desktop\/js\/mobile.js.Bien demarrer: Get off to a good start

plugins\/mobile\/core\/template\/widgets.Inverse la position de l'indicateur de v: Reverses the position of the value indicator
plugins\/mobile\/core\/template\/widgets.Affiche durée ou date de la valeur: Displays duration or date of the value

info.json.Attzltion l'app v1 n'est pas compatible:
Attzltion the v1 app is not compatible with the latest Android. The official Jeedom application allows you to control your Jeedom home automation system, whether in local Wifi, or on your operator's 3G/4G network.

The app automatically connects to your Jeedom with automatic initialization by QRcode, no configuration is necessary. (possibility to do it manually)
You will find on your mobile all the features of your Jeedom.
You will be able to customize your application with shortcuts and more...

Current features:
- Management of your scenarios.
- Management of your home automation according to your rooms and equipment.
- Shift and automatic status return
- Compatibility with plugins, such as thermostat, alarm, camera etc...
- Customizable interface with shortcuts.
- General home automation summary and by room
- Notifications (with ASK support)
- Display of Designs

More features and compatibilities are coming in future updates!

Privacy.
No data (home automation or personal) is stored or kept on our servers
